property.name: Text
property.value: You may use resources from Kahliel’s pool to pay for Harad ally cards of any sphere.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Andrath Guardsman from your hand, choose a non-unique enemy engaged with you. That enemy cannot attack you this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of the quest phase, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and put it into play engaged with you. Then, reveal one less encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0). Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Yazan is declared as an attacker, deal 1 damage to a non-unique enemy in play. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of the staging step, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and put it into play engaged with you. Then, reveal 1 less encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0). Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Jubayr exhausts to defend an attack, discard 1 facedown shadow card from a non-unique enemy. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Dwarf character. Limit 1 per character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Firyal commits to the quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may discard the looked at card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a unique character with the Ranger trait and another unique character with the Warrior trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the attached enemy is dealt any amount of damage, the engaged player shuffles his deck and discards the top card. If the discarded card’s cost is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, add Horse-hair Lasso and attached enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players quest successfully, the engaged player discards the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card’s $ is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, add Poisoned Spear and attached enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players travel to a location, if the active location’s printed $ is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, the engaged player adds Pit Trap and attached enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character defends an attack against the attached enemy, if the defending character has more remaining hit points than the attached enemy, add Noose of Vines and attached enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Cannot take more than 3 damage each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Territorial Ape gets +X $ and + X Û, where X is the $ of the active location.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if a location was explored this round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Strangling Python damages a character, attach it to that character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached character cannot ready.”)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Giant Centipede damages a character, treat that character’s text box as if it were blank until the end of the round (except for Traits).

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Treat the defending character’s text box as blank until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Mumak Trail is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Mumak Trail leaves play as an explored location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Wild Mumak and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.”

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of his deck. Each player discards each card he controls that shares a title with any of the 5 cards he just discarded.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach Terrible Fever to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to attached character.”)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player discards a random card from his hand and assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the discarded card’s cost.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a random card from your hand and assign X damage among characters you control. X is the discarded card’s cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: The great apes of the jungle gather in the trees around you. They shadow your steps and slow your progress.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set each copy of Wild Mûmak and each Capture objective aside, out of play. Each player adds 1 different location to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location, shuffle 1 set aside Wild Mûmak into the encounter deck. The players cannot advance unless the number of Wild Mûmak in play is equal to the number of players.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player attaches 1 random set-aside Capture objective to a Wild Mûmak in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if there is no active location, reveal an additional encounter card this phase. This stage cannot be defeated while there are any Capture objectives in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.
